statements: UPDATE player_profiles SET username='Alice', score=1000, progress=50 WHERE username='Alice';
UPDATE player_profiles SET progress=75, score=1200, username='Bob' WHERE score>1000;
UPDATE player_profiles SET score = 1000, progress = 75 WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE player_profiles SET progress = 50, score = score + 100 WHERE username = 'jane_smith';
UPDATE player_profiles SET score = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE game_history SET completed = TRUE, level = 5 WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE player_profiles SET progress = 0.75, score = 500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE game_history SET completed = true, level = 5 WHERE player_id = 3 AND game_id = 10;
UPDATE player_profiles SET score = 500, progress = 0.75 WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE player_settings SET sound_enabled = true, notifications_enabled = false WHERE player_id = 54321;
UPDATE player_profiles SET username = 'john_doe', score = 1000 WHERE player_id = 1234;
UPDATE player_settings SET notifications_enabled = true, sound_enabled = false WHERE player_id = 5678;
UPDATE player_profile SET score = 100, progress = 0.75 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE game_stats SET win_ratio = 0.8, total_games_played = 50 WHERE player_id = 4;
UPDATE player_profile SET progress = 0.75, score = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 50, item_name = 'Sword' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_profiles SET score = 1000, progress = 0.75 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE player_inventory SET quantity = 5 WHERE player_id = 1 AND item_name = 'Sword';
UPDATE player_profiles SET score = 1000, progress = 75.50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE player_stats SET wins = 15, losses = 5, games_played = games_played + 1 WHERE player_id = 3;
